User

Interface PurpleBoxUserInterface


  • public interface PurpleBoxUserInterface
    Implement to create a PurpleBox Administrator class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Fantastic4

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      java.util.ArrayList<Movie> search(java.lang.String keywords)
      Search and return a list of movie objects by attributes of those movies.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        java.util.ArrayList<Movie> search(java.lang.String keywords)
        Search and return a list of movie objects by attributes of those movies. Keywords: All - returns all movies. Type - Blu-Ray or DVD. New Release - Within the last week.
        Parameters:
        keywords - String attribute of a movie object
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Movie Objects
        Require:
        User input that matches movie object attribute.
        Ensure:
        An ArrayList with all movie objects with those attributes.

      • addMovieToCart

        void addMovieToCart(Movie movie)
             throws MovieUnavailableException
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie Object
        Throws:
        MovieUnavailableException - Movie is unavailable
        Require:
        No requirement since exception will be thrown.
        Ensure:
        Movie selected is added to cart

      • removeMovieFromCart

        void removeMovieFromCart(Movie movie)
                  throws MovieUnavailableException
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie Object
        Throws:
        MovieUnavailableException - Movie is not in cart
        Require:
        No requirement since exception will be thrown.
        Ensure:
        Movie selected is removed from cart.

      • removeAllFromCart

        void removeAllFromCart(Movie movie)
                throws EmptyCartException
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie Object
        Throws:
        EmptyCartException - Cart is empty.
        Require:
        No requirement since exception will be thrown.
        Ensure:
        Cart will be empty.

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable(Movie movie)
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie Object
        Returns:
        True - Movie is available. False - Movie is unavailable.
        Require:
        Movie has to be in inventory.
        Ensure:
        Check the quantity is at least 1 and Check Admin has not marked movie unavailable.

      • checkOutMovies

        void checkOutMovies()
             throws EmptyCartException
        Throws:
        EmptyCartException - Cart is empty
        Require:
        No requirement since exception will be thrown.
        Ensure:
        All movies in cart are checked out to this user.

      • returnMovies

        void returnMovies(Movie movie)
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie Object
        Require:
        No requirement admin will handle cases where A movie not in inventory is returned.
        Ensure:
        Movie is returned and quantity is incremented.

      • applyPromoCode

        void applyPromoCode(java.lang.String promoCode)
             throws InvalidPromoCodeException
        Parameters:
        promoCode - String promotional code.
        Throws:
        InvalidPromoCodeException - promotional code is invalid
        Require:
        User input a promotional code.
        Ensure:
        If promotional code is valid it will be applied.
